0: I read some of the positive reviews and I ca nt help but wonder if those people are staying in a completely different hotel have very low standards or perhaps I am in the only room in the hotel that has never been updated or renovated

I could see this place getting an update in the next few years though

The TV could use some updating
The rooms are in need of a renovation and updating however the view of the lake is very nice
Not as updated as most Mariots I have visited lately
In bad need of a renovation

1: This is another Mariot in the midst of a renovation
I appreciate the attempt to remain operable during major renovations but the lobby is a complete eyesore
2: they are currently having Renovations done but the rooms are very nice

3: The room had recently received a full renovation top to bottom
Wish the pool had not been down for maintenance

I imagine that if the building is quite old the same room design and architecture was left intact while the entire property got a facelift
